entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
